text: Knema krusemaniana is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Kalimantan in Indonesia. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema krusemaniana. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
